name: Home Run Shooting 2018
description:
A fps where you can use a base ball bat to strike back enemy attacks. Aside from a few sound effects, there is no art to speak of. I simply tried to put together a simple gameplay loop which consists of running around, shooting, collecting ammo and health packs. 

As this is my second game ever, I am definitely looking for some feedback. So feel free to let me know what you think of it. 

So have fun :) !
